Posts.Content: SandraSummers wrote: Hello...Sandra again... Another question:  My doctor (radiologist at Breast Imaging Center) did not get a good biopsy so I go for lumpectomy this coming Thursday.  With less than 1 full centimeter of a tumor she said we have caught it early.  Then I read about the "grade" of the tumor and lymph node involvement.  Is it safe to say an 8mm tumor is catching it early with probably no lymph involvement? Scared out of my brain... Dx 1/3/2017, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, ER+, HER2- Radiation Therapy 3/5/2017 Hormonal Therapy 7/1/2017 Arimidex (anastrozole) Surgery Lumpectomy: Right Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 8mm bi-rad 5 SandraSummers SandraSummers
